file.name: tick.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
paths:
    /tick:
        post:
            summary: Register a page view for statistical and analytical purpose.
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            oneOf:
                                - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PageView"
                                - $ref: "#/components/schemas/TrackableSearch"

                required: true
            responses:
                "201":
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Statistics
components:
    schemas:
        PageView:
            properties:
                url:
                    description: URL of page view to track for analytics
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                referrer:
                    description: URL of referrer
                    type: string
                type:
                    description: The type of page view event (i.e. page_view, discussion_view)
                    type: string
                discussionID:
                    description: The ID of a discussion to include in analytics
                    type: integer
            required:
                - url
            type: object
        TrackableSearch:
            properties:
                type:
                    description: The type of search event.
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                    enum:
                        - search
                domain:
                    description: The domain being searched.
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
                searchResults:
                    description: The number of results returned by the search.
                    type: integer
                searchQuery:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        terms:
                            description: The individual terms of the query.
                            type: array
                            items:
                                type: string
                        negativeTerms:
                            description: The negative terms used in the query, if any.
                            type: array
                            items:
                                type: string
                        originalQuery:
                            description: The query string.
                            type: string
                searchTypes:
                    type: array
                    items:
                        type: string
                page:
                    description: The page of results returned.
                    type: integer
                title:
                    description: Filter by title
                    type: string
                siteSection:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/SiteSections"
                source:
                    description: The source being searched.
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        key:
                            type: string
                        label:
                            type: string
                author:
                    description: Author filters applied on the search.
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        authorID:
                            type: array
                            items:
                                type: integer
                        authorName:
                            type: array
                            items:
                                type: string
                recordType:
                    description: The type of records searched.
                    type: array
                    items:
                        type: string
                tag:
                    description: Tag filters applied on the search.
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        tagID:
                            type: array
                            items:
                                type: integer
                        tagName:
                            type: array
                            items:
                                type: string
                category:
                    description: Category filters applied on the search.
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        categoryID:
                            type: array
                            items:
                                type: integer
                        categoryName:
                            type: array
                            items:
                                type: string
            required:
                - type
                - domain
                - searchResults
                - searchQuery

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "TrackableSearch": resolve "#/components/schemas/TrackableSearch": property "siteSection": at applications/dashboard/openapi/tick.yml:83:27: $ref: resolve "#/components/schemas/SiteSections": resolve: can't find value for "components/schemas/SiteSections"
